overview: Ariadne auf Naxos is one of many beautifully crafted operas created by Richard Strauss and his librettist Hugo von Hofmannsthal. In the compelling production from the Zurich Opera, recorded on this DVD, Christoph von Dohn√°nyi leads a particularly strong cast of singer-actors in a thrilling interpretation of the work.
title: Ariadne auf Naxos - Zurich
